response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs and goals. Given its value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,500. This special offer is tailored to recognize your interest and commitment to excellence. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 14500}
